content.title: Intro
content.content: -yon is a Quenya suffix that has two meanings.

content.title: -yon1
content.content:
Used as a patronimic suffix.[1]

Examples
Yondo - "son, boy"

content.title: -yon2
content.content: Also written as -yonde, (from root YŎNO), for denoting a region, any (fairly extensive) region between obstacles such as rivers or mountains.[2]
